name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Lenny Faces: Text emotions or Text Faces

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: All category (Angry, Sad, Shrug, Happy, Gun, Confused, etc.) lenny faces.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Lenny faces are text emotions. By sending these faces we can express our feelings, mood, etc. By installing this extension, you can copy lenny-faces in click.

- Click on the Lenny face you want to copy. It will be copied to the clipboard from where you can use it to share on social media or wherever you want.

- By clicking on the history icon, you will be able to see your past activities on this site like what you copied before and what category belongs to those Lenny faces.

We have mentioned various types of lenny-faces in which some are:-

➤Angry
➤Bad Mood
➤Happy
➤Confused
➤Cry
➤Dance
➤Weired, etc.
